sn12.32:1.2: Atha kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn12.32:1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.32:1.4: “moḷiyaphagguno, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhu sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto”ti.
sn12.32:1.5: “Na hi nūna so āyasmā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye assāsamalatthā”ti.
sn12.32:2.1: “Tena hāyasmā sāriputto imasmiṃ dhammavinaye assāsaṃ patto”ti?
sn12.32:5.1: Atha kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.32:5.3: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmī”ti.
sn12.32:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi:
sn12.32:6.2: “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena sāriputtaṃ āmantehi:
sn12.32:6.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.32:6.6: “Evaṃ, āvuso”ti kho āyasmā sāriputto tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn12.32:6.8: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmī”ti?
sn12.32:6.9: “Na kho, bhante, etehi padehi etehi byañjanehi attho vutto”ti.
sn12.32:6.10: “Yena kenacipi, sāriputta, pariyāyena kulaputto aññaṃ byākaroti, atha kho byākataṃ byākatato daṭṭhabban”ti.
sn12.32:6.12: ‘na kho, bhante, etehi padehi etehi byañjanehi attho vutto’”ti.
sn12.32:7.2: ‘kathaṃ jānatā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṃ passatā aññā byākatā—
sn12.32:7.3: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
sn12.32:7.4: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:8.2: ‘kathaṃ jānatā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṃ passatā aññā byākatā—
sn12.32:8.3: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti;
sn12.32:8.5: ‘yaṃnidānā, āvuso, jāti, tassa nidānassa khayā khīṇasmiṃ khīṇāmhīti viditaṃ.
sn12.32:8.7: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
sn12.32:9.2: ‘jāti panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavā’ti?
sn12.32:9.3: Evaṃ puṭṭho taṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:9.5: ‘jāti panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavā’ti?
sn12.32:9.7: ‘jāti kho, āvuso, bhavanidānā bhavasamudayā bhavajātikā bhavappabhavā’ti.
sn12.32:10.2: ‘bhavo panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo’ti?
sn12.32:10.3: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:10.5: ‘bhavo panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo’ti?
sn12.32:10.7: ‘bhavo kho, āvuso, upādānanidāno upādānasamudayo upādānajātiko upādānappabhavo’ti.
sn12.32:11.3: sace pana taṃ, sāriputta, evaṃ puccheyyuṃ—
sn12.32:11.4: taṇhā panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavā’ti?
sn12.32:11.5: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:11.7: ‘taṇhā panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavā’ti?
sn12.32:11.9: ‘taṇhā kho, āvuso, vedanānidānā vedanāsamudayā vedanājātikā vedanāpabhavā’ti.
sn12.32:12.2: ‘kathaṃ jānato pana te, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṃ passato yā vedanāsu nandī sā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti.
sn12.32:12.3: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:12.5: ‘kathaṃ jānato pana te, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṃ passato yā vedanāsu nandī sā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti evaṃ puṭṭhohaṃ, bhante, evaṃ byākareyyaṃ:
sn12.32:12.8: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
sn12.32:12.9: Imā kho, āvuso, tisso vedanā aniccā.
sn12.32:12.11: viditaṃ, yā vedanāsu nandī sā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti.
sn12.32:13.2: Ayampi kho, sāriputta, pariyāyo, etasseva atthassa saṅkhittena veyyākaraṇāya:
sn12.32:14.2: ‘kathaṃ vimokkhā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, aññā byākatā—
sn12.32:14.3: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti?
sn12.32:14.4: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:14.6: ‘kathaṃ vimokkhā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, aññā byākatā—
sn12.32:14.7: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
sn12.32:14.9: ‘ajjhattaṃ vimokkhā khvāhaṃ, āvuso, sabbupādānakkhayā tathā sato viharāmi yathā sataṃ viharantaṃ āsavā nānussavanti, attānañca nāvajānāmī’ti.
sn12.32:15.2: Ayampi kho sāriputta, pariyāyo etasseva atthassa saṅkhittena veyyākaraṇāya—
sn12.32:15.3: ye āsavā samaṇena vuttā tesvāhaṃ na kaṅkhāmi, te me pahīnāti na vicikicchāmī”ti.
sn12.32:15.5: Idaṃ vatvā sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
sn12.32:16.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn12.32:16.2: “pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ maṃ, āvuso, bhagavā paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi, tassa me ahosi dandhāyitattaṃ.
sn12.32:16.3: Yato ca kho me, āvuso, bhagavā paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ anumodi, tassa mayhaṃ, āvuso, etadahosi—
sn12.32:16.4: divasañcepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, divasampāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi.
sn12.32:16.5: Rattiñcepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, rattimpāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi.
sn12.32:16.6: Rattindivaṃ cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, rattindivampāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi.
sn12.32:16.7: Dve rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya …pe…
sn12.32:16.9: tīṇi rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya …pe…
sn12.32:16.11: cattāri rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya …pe…
sn12.32:16.13: pañca rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya …pe…
sn12.32:16.15: cha rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya …pe…
sn12.32:16.17: satta rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, satta rattindivānipāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehī”ti.
sn12.32:17.1: Atha kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.32:17.3: pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ maṃ, āvuso, bhagavā paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi, tassa me ahosi dandhāyitattaṃ.
sn12.32:17.4: Yato ca kho me, āvuso, bhagavā paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ anumodi, tassa mayhaṃ, āvuso, etadahosi—
sn12.32:17.5: divasañcepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, divasampāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi;
sn12.32:17.13: satta rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, satta rattindivānipāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehī”ti.
sn12.32:18.1: “Sā hi, bhikkhu, sāriputtassa dhammadhātu suppaṭividdhā, yassā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā divasaṃ cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, divasampi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi.
sn12.32:18.2: Rattiṃ cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, rattimpi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …pe…
sn12.32:18.3: rattindivaṃ cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, rattindivampi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:18.4: dve rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, dve rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:18.5: tīṇi rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, tīṇi rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:18.6: cattāri rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, cattāri rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:18.7: pañca rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, pañca rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:18.8: cha rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, cha rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:18.9: satta rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, satta rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehī”ti.
